reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really Loud but Washes Good
reviews.reviewText: Had it for over a year. Washes great. Just really, really loud on the spin cycle. Sent the first one back because I thought it was damaged. Nope! They're just really loud. I don't over load either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Customer service nightmare
reviews.reviewText: Bought the front loading washer and dryer set one year ago. I called the retail store where I purchased the product a day or 2 before a Samsung agent called me to schedule an appointment to check out the problem. The retailer told me my machine was under warranty. The initial agent from Samsung also said it was under warranty. The repair man that came to assess the problem said it was a manufacturer defect. Almost a week later, 2 days before Thanksgiving, Samsung says my appointment is cancelled, they can’t get the part and to arrange for an exchange.At this point, I am now told I need my receipt from 1 year ago. It is NOT under warranty because the one year was up 2 days before Samsung called me back to set up initial appointment to check out my machine.Samsung would not take any responsibility in the fact that their merchandise was defective and their parts were faulty. The agent I talked to had zero interest in trying to figure out something that could be done to fix a one year old machine. She just dismissed me and kept passing me off to the retail store where I purchased it and said my 1 yr manufacturers warranty was expired. Their 48 hour delay is now costing me another $700 for a new washing machine.NEVER WILL I EVER BUY ANOTHER SAMSUNG PRODUCT and I Will see to it anyone I know does not purchase one either!They do not stand behind their merchandise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Do not buy a Samsung washer or dryer. It has been the worst experience that I have ever had. My washer and dryer are 5 years old. I have had to replace the heating element in the dryer. I have had to replace the main control board and the entire motor assembly in the washing machine. Samsung has terrible customer service when you call them on the phone and even with the 10 year warranty that is supposed to be on the motor they will not cover it. Buyer beware!!! Buy at you own risk!!! I wouldn’t own another Samsung appliance if they gave it to me. To many head aches and to many day off of work to get thing right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Returned for banging; but the 2nd one is just as bad. Don't Buy!
reviews.reviewText: Terrible. And not made in Korea like you might like to believe. It's cheap garbage. After a month of rattling the dishes and windows, we had Samsung come out...and they replaced it with new washer. This one's just as bad, maybe worse. Our brand new house now has a crack in the ceiling. It took SO LONG to get the first one replaced, I think we're just going to eat the loss and buy a different washer. And I know washers, having owned a laundromat with 30 wonderful Maytags, so in my very expert opinion this is a faulty model and should be recalled ASAP.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Samsung Doesnt Service Stacked Units
reviews.reviewText: Didnt buy my Samsung Washer and Dryer at Amazon. Bought it from local Lowes. After one month of use of brand new Samsung washer, SUD error code appears. We use HE detergents and try to not over pour detergent. Called Samsung for service as still under warranty. Samsung sent us to Third Party company who said they dont service stacked units. Called Lowes who said they dont un-install stacked units for customers. So one month new Samsung. Complete waste of money. Do not buy. Horrible Samsung customer service. They dont service stacked units. So why they sell stacked units to begin with???? Do not buy. We deeply regret our purchase and will never buy Samsung again. So much for one year warranty. We have to pay someone to uninstall the units and service the issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2021
Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Brand new washer had the bolts that hold the counter-weights to the drum come loose and destroy the washer after the 3rd wash cycle.
